tasks.build: deno task build:css && deno task build:js
tasks.build:css: deno task find:css -exec deno task esbuild --outbase=style --outdir=an_website/static/css --minify --sourcemap '{}' +
tasks.build:js: deno task find:ts -exec deno task esbuild --outbase=an_website --outdir=an_website/static/js --minify --sourcemap '{}' +
tasks.clean: deno task clean:css && deno task clean:js
tasks.target: echo es$(python3 -c 'from datetime import datetime; print(min((now := datetime.utcnow()).year - (5 + (now.month < 7)), 2022))')
tasks.watch: deno task find:ts -exec deno task esbuild --outbase=an_website --outdir=an_website/static/js --minify --sourcemap --watch '{}' +
